name: Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard, 10 oz. Squeeze Bottle
short_description: One 10 oz squeeze bottle of Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard
Made from the same French-style recipe since 1777, Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard uses the finest ingredients for a quality, gourmet condiment
Crafted with white wine, #1 grade mustard seeds and spices for a strong, delicious flavor
Our creamy dijon mustard has a smooth texture and bold flavor for limitless uses in recipes
Try using our dijon mustard as the perfect sandwich spread
Add dijon mustard to enhance any of your favorite meat marinades
Excellent as a dipping sauce
Resealable squeeze bottle allows quick access and easy squeeze application
Certified Kosher mustard
SNAP & EBT eligible food item
product_description: Unlock the potential of all your favorite foods with the Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard bottle. Since 1777, our dijon mustard has been prepared in accordance with the original recipe from Dijon, France. Made with #1 grade mustard seeds, our white wine infused mustard is blended with spices to offer the bold flavor you expect from Grey Poupon. Bring the refined taste of Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard to your favorite recipes and enjoy some of the finer flavors in life. Try using the easy squeeze bottle of dijon mustard as a sandwich spread to bring some boldness to lunchtime. Mix our tangy mustard sauce with balsamic vinegar and olive oil to create a delicious salad dressing, or use it as an ingredient in a delicious dijon mustard marinade. Enhance your favorite chicken or pork entree with a little dijon mustard. Our dijon mustard comes in a 10-ounce resealable squeeze bottle for easy application. Whether you’re making lunch or preparing for a dinner party, Grey Poupon Dijon Mustard will elevate your next meal or occasion.

short_description: A MUSTARD FOR EVERYONE - This Dijon mustard is not only USDA Organic, but also keto friendly and is certified Gluten Free! Great to share with your friends and family
TRADITIONAL FRENCH FLAVORING - Check! With tangy flavor, mustard seeds, herbs and spices, this is a bold organic Dijon Mustard
ORGANIC FOR EVERYONE - Organicville dressings are always Organic, Dairy Free, Gluten Free, Plant Based, and Vegan. We also offer Keto Friendly options as well
EASY TO ENJOY - To preserve quality and taste, Organicville mustards must be refrigerated after opening
ABOUT US - Organicville believes the choice to eat organic should be available to everyone, through our offerings we empower people to eat organic without limits

name: Maille Mustard Variety Pack 7 Oz, 4 Count
short_description: Love Maille-try the Maille Mustard Variety Pack with the Dijon Original, Old Style, Honey Dijon, and rich country and enjoy a variety of classic flavors
Maille Dijon Mustard Originale has a unique creamy texture and a smooth finish. Zero protein
Maille old style mustard is made with crisp whole mustard seeds and won the gold medal for best grainy mustard at the 2012 world-wide mustard competition
Maille Honey Dijon is a go-to mustard for vinaigrettes or to glaze vegetable roasts, or in chicken recipes because of its great honey mustard sweetness and its spicy dijon kick
Maille Rich Country Dijon has a remarkably creamy, mayo-like texture, with flecks of brown mustard seeds and a spicy mustard kick mustard for the perfect accompaniment to chicken and fish
Maille Dijon Honey Mustard Originale has been awarded the chef's best award for best taste
product_description: Maille Dijon Originale Mustard no added sulfates enhances the flavor of any meal. By adding just one teaspoon of Maille Honey Dijon no added sulfates, you will unlock the full potential of any dish, even the most simple one. Maille Dijon Honey Mustard no added sulfates is characterized by its creamy texture and smooth finish. Maille Dijon Originale Mustard no added sulfates pairs brilliantly with all types of foods, enhancing meat, fish, and vegetable dishes, in addition to sandwiches. Whisk it into vinaigrettes or use it as secret cooking ingredients in hot and cold sauces. Cooking it with macaroni and cheese or a hot potato salad will offer an unexpected, yet tasty, kick. At Maille, we believe firmly that the right ingredients can truly define a meal. With Maille's exceptional taste, just a spoon can turn any food into a culinary experience! The versatility of Maille is the best-kept secret to enhance any dish, bringing excitement to your veggies, whole grains and lean protein like fish and chicken recipes. For over 270 years, we have been cherishing the resources - the land, the people, and their knowledge - that make our delicious mustard varieties possible. Established by Antoine-Claude Maille in 1747, the house of Maille was the official supplier to the Kings of France and many European Royal Courts. Don’t Make It. Master It.

product_description: Grey Poupon Country Dijon Mustard combines the refined taste of Grey Poupon you love with a whole grain Mustard twist. Since 1777, Grey Poupon has been prepared in accordance with the original recipe from Dijon, France for Mustard-lovers with discerning taste. Made with #1 Grade mustard seeds and white wine, this grainy Dijon mustard is blended with spices and herbs to deliver the delectable flavor you expect. Whether youre snacking or preparing for a dinner party, this gourmet mustard is a versatile condiment. Accentuate your favorite entrees and side dishes like Dijon mustard potatoes or roasted pork loin glazed with Grey Poupon Country Dijon Mustard. By bringing the refined taste of Grey Poupon Country Dijon Mustard to your favorite dishes and recipes, you can truly treat yourself to the finer things in life. The resealable 8 ounce jar helps to maintain freshness. Store in the fridge after opening for best tasting flavor.

name: Bijan Mustardson Gourmet Dijon Mustard, Bold & Smooth 9 oz – Premium Spicy Condiment for Sandwiches, Pretzels, Burgers
short_description: Authentic Dijon Flavor — Crafted with distilled vinegar, mustard seed, and premium wine, this mustard delivers a smooth, rich taste with a bold, spicy kick perfect for sandwiches and burgers.

Premium 9 oz Single Bottle — Conveniently sized gourmet 9-ounce jar, ideal for home chefs, BBQ enthusiasts, or mustard lovers looking for a bold kick that’s guaranteed to win the tastebud championship in your mouth.
Versatile Gourmet Condiment — Perfect addition to marinades, salad dressings, dipping sauces, charcuterie boards, or as a flavorful spread for pretzels and snacks.
Clean, Quality Ingredients — Made without artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives, featuring distilled vinegar, mustard seed, wine, salt, turmeric, and spices for a delicious taste.
Ideal Gift for Foodies — Unique, chef-approved gourmet condiment featuring high quality ingredients; great for housewarming parties, cookouts, or any and all food lovers.
Bijan Robinson Approved — Inspired and personally endorsed by Bijan Robinson, whose genuine love for mustard sparked the creation of this exceptional gourmet blend.
